history.proof: intros l. induction l as [| h t IH]. - apply list_bool_succ_rec with 1. sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: induction l as [| h t IH].
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction l as [| h t IH].
apply HPS with (list_repeat Zero 0 ++ One :: t).

original: intros l. induction l as [| h t IH]. - apply list_bool_succ_rec with 1. - apply HPS with (list_repeat Zero 0 ++ One :: t). + apply in_lbs_1. + apply IH.
